page.title: 18A RESIDENT OF LONGNEWTON
page.content: I LIVE IN A HOUSE IN{LONGNEWTON.}IT IS A NICE HOUSE.IT HAS 4 BEDROOMS,TWO BATHROOMS,A KITCHEN,A COMBINED LIVING AND DINING ROOM AND A FAMILY ROOM.I HAVE MOVED HOUSE{TWICE}BEFORE I MOVED INTO LONGNEWTON AND I USE TO LIVE IN SCOTLAND. I GO TO A SCHOOL IN LONGNEWTON AND I THINK IT IS QUITE GOOD.I HAVE A LOT OF FRIENDS. MY HOBBIES ARE GOING TO{CUBS,STAMP {COLLECTING,SWIMMING,PLAYING FOOTBALL, {PLAYING ON MY HOME COMPUTER AND BMX {BIKE.}I LIKE TO WEAR FASHIONABLE CLOTHES AND I HATE FLAREY TROUSERS BUT MY MUM MAKES ME WEAR THEM.I PLAY {FOOTBALL}WITH THE SCHOOL AND THE CUBS. I AM THE{GOAL-KEEPER.}MY FAVOURITE TELEVISION PROGRAMMES ARE{"MINDER", {"MAGNUM"}AND{"GRANGE HILL"
